title: Enware
author: Enware
content: AboutEnware refers to a community library created by addressing developers and those aiming to benefit the blockchain ecosystem. By Enware.org and by the developers Cryptocurrency and blockchain technological software created are offered completely free of charge and can be developed. You can learn more by checking out the Enware GitHub library.The Importance of EnwareIt is very important to benefit blockchains and contribute to shaping the technology of the future. Today, many cryptocurrency projects have provided and continue to provide significant benefits to blockchain technologies in order to write their names in history with golden letters.Ethereum, Solana, Openzeppelin, Solidity Technologies, Bitcoin, Infura and many more tech development companies are huge in blockchain technologies. has importance.The Enware project puts a lot of effort into providing technological benefit to a great extent and writing its name in golden letters like other projects.VisionEnware.org is a developer and support library that aims to provide benefits for all individuals/organizations aiming to benefit the blockchain and cryptocurrency industry. It aims to be a pioneer in blockchain structures, which is the technology of the future, and to build one of the first leading technology structures that come to mind by developers in the cryptocurrency world.Infura, Ethereum, Web3.js, Ether.js, Web3PHP, Solidity, NodeJS, UniSwap V2/V3, Eth.Build, GitHub, QuickNode, Openzeppelin, Moralis etc. to strengthen hundreds of thousands of technological building blockchain infrastructure and aim to progress. needs infrastructure. Enware.org sees it as a vision to create an ecosystem that aims to be a pioneer among these infrastructures.MissionProgress never happens quickly and quickly. Building beautiful things takes time, and as Enware technologies, our first priority is to move forward without rushing while developing reliable, advanced and quality infrastructures.We want to develop very practical and understandable infrastructures for all developers (Amateur, Intermediate or Expert Level). Of course, we use many libraries in all of our infrastructures and we do not neglect reliability.You can work with Enware systems in infrastructure partnerships for all future or existing blockchain and cryptocurrency projects. You can contact us or directly use our infrastructure clients to be included in our ecosystem and benefit from Enware technological infrastructures as a part of our ecosystem.You can contact us from our e-mail or use FORK structure by using our module structures to take part in our ecosystem and create partnerships by making use of the module structure.BSC WALLET GENERATEENWARESWAPBALANCETOKEN PRICEFARM & POOLW3BANKMULTI RPCENWARE MODULE-SHOPAUTO-TRADE SYSTEMLP & TOKEN LOCK DAPPFEE MODULEMAKE WEB3 SHOPEnware Brand PowerAll library contents developed by Enware and made available to the community as open source are designed to strengthen the Enware Token infrastructure and pool. Some of the ready-made software offered as software has been prepared with Enware Token transaction priority in order to protect the brand power and increase market making. You can visit the Enware GitHub Library for examples.const Web3 = require('web3');const axios = require('axios');const Contract = require('web3-eth-contract');const Enware = require('enware');const EnwareBuild = require('enware-build');const EnwareContract = require('enware-contract');const web3 = new Web3('https://rpc.enware.org/BSC/019b8c918129assx9939mnnz867vx927741');Open Source Access CodeAll software infrastructures developed by the community are available as open source in the GitHub Enware library so that other community members can access and make suggestions for improvement.Enware and BlockchainsEnware can offer different and extensible software for almost all blockchains using RPC systems. All software developed is publicly available from the Document page or GitHub library. Updates to software offered by Enware are only shared through the GitHub Enware Official Library and no public announcements are made to the community. Developers follow the GitHub library from all developments. may be to DevelopmentAnyone in the Enware community can voluntarily participate in the Enware development community and contribute to working with the original developer team. Enware gives importance to the suggestions of the community and is ready to cooperate in all software that aims to provide technological benefit.// Package.json Example"node_modules/enware": {  "version": "1.3.2",  "resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/enware",  "integrity": "sha512-dJJHS84nvpoxv6ijTMkd63QEtKdLyDt2AyMJJdVzTCk78uir/6XtVWrdS6w==",  "hasInstallScript": true,  "dependencies": {    "@types/node": "^12.12.6",    "got": "12.1.0",    "swarm-js": "^0.1.40"  },  "engines": {    "node": ">=8.0.0"  }},"node_modules/web3-core": {  "version": "1.8.1",  "resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/web3-core/-/web3-core-1.8.1.tgz",  "integrity": "sha512-LbRZlJH2N6nS3n3Eo9NM/Ajhh97dAdglYs6rToQ2DbL2RLvTYmTew4O/y9WmOk4nq9COw==",  "dependencies": {    "@types/bn.js": "^5.1.0",    "@types/node": "^12.12.6",    "bignumber.js": "^9.0.0",    "web3-core-helpers": "1.8.1",    "web3-core-method": "1.8.1",    "web3-core-requestmanager": "1.8.1",    "web3-utils": "1.8.1"  },  "engines": {    "node": ">=8.0.0"  }},"node_modules/web3-core-helpers": {  "version": "1.8.1",  "resolved": "https://registry.npmjs.org/web3-core-helpers/-/web3-core-helpers-1.8.1.tgz",  "integrity": "sha512-ClzNO6T1S1gifC+BThw0+G+w4PntAdNtKahxWKApWJ0l9idqot/fFIDXwO3Euu7I0Xqw==",  "dependencies": {    "web3-eth-iban": "1.8.1",    "web3-utils": "1.8.1"  },  "engines": {    "node": ">=8.0.0"  }},DApp ExampleYou can examine the working principle of CDN systems and the advantages of using Enware CDN structure with examples.You can save hundreds of lines of code by providing 3 CDN Connections. Add the links below to your html file one by one.Web3 Connection - USE CDN Web3.JShttps://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/web3@latest/dist/web3.min.jsEnware RPC (BSC) - USE CDN Enware RPChttps://enware.org/CDN/enware.jsEnware walletConnect JS - USE CDN Enware Wallethttps://enware.org/CDN/connectWallet.jsEnware Web3Modal JS - USE CDN Enware Modal (Optional)https://enware.org/CDN/web3Modal.jsVIEW ENWARE ECOSYSTEMYou can connect your wallet as a test.CONNECT WALLETEnware Balance: You can connect wallet as a show.CHECK BALANCECheck ABI Code BSC - WBNBCheck the Console after the operation! F12 > ConsoleCHECK WBNB ABI CODETechnological Contribution and PartnersThanks to Infura, Ethereum, Web3.js, Ether.js, Web3PHP, Solidity, NodeJS, UniSwap V2/V3, Eth.Build, GitHub, QuickNode, Openzeppelin, Moralis and all other contributors.Enware [ENW] TokenToken Name: EnwareToken Symbol: ENWContract: 0x29d262ff7e08ec0977688ab1565ef2f7f38a9fd6Total Supply: 473.000.000Circulation Supply: 473.000.000Fair Launched Supply: 473.000.000Total Fee: 3% [Liquidity Fee: 1%, Marketing: 2%]Slippage: 4%BSCScan  PancakeSwap  Coinmarketcap  Poocoin  Token SecurityThe Enware community created the Enware Token in order to highlight the technological benefits it offers, to achieve a great community goal, and to participate in the competition in blockchain technology. Enware Token has BEP20 Token using popular blockchain Binance Smart Chain for use with Low transfer fees and low usage fees. It is possible to access the community token as "Enware" on all decentralized exchanges and Info websites using the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) network.Enware Token has been produced in a total of 473,000,000 Units and does not have infinite production! 100% amount of 473 Million Enware tokens was released using PancakeSwap V2 in a fair launch. To gain the trust of the community, Enware gave up ownership of the token. Enware token honeypot free of risk! Enware token does not contain any function that may cause victimization in its smart contract.You can find the details of the smart contract below. In addition, it is possible to access the development results with ABI codes belonging to the smart contract and the tests performed on Eth.Build.Enware Token = Created for developers and intended to connote development & development and technology in the blockchain world and to be used for this purpose.Wallet & PairPcv2 Router Address: 0x10ED43C718714eb63d5aA57B78B54704E256024EPcv2 Factory Address: 0xcA143Ce32Fe78f1f7019d7d551a6402fC5350c73Pair (Cake-LP) Address: 0xC356C64f7465ac6a60433e53DE628070ecFfCF1bOwner Address: 0x7352C67A06F30A11778A006C51Af35d0E2F99cB9Marketing Fee Address: 0x12997C97b49CBdcb11dfB086173eC788D9a34004Website: enware.orgDocuments: https://docs.enware.orgGithub: https://github.com/enware-orgTwitter: https://twitter.com/EnwareOrgTelegram: https://t.me/enware
